description: Access: Class Spryker\Shared\Category\CategoryConfig accesses Spryker\Client\Kernel\AbstractBundleConfig which violates rule "No call from Shared to Client"
Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method 'touchActive' signature. That violates the rule "All bridge methods must have exactly the same signature as their interface"
Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method 'touchDeleted' signature. That violates the rule "All bridge methods must have exactly the same signature as their interface"
